snippet.title: Fernbus Coach Simulator – Trailer
snippet.description:
The Fernbus Coach Simulator is the first simulation of the now very popular intercity busses. The Fernbus Coach Simulator shows the world of a large coaches’ driver on the German highway and major roads in great detail. Many thanks to the cooperation with FlixBus!

With a large and modern MAN Lion’s Coach Bus you experience the daily life of a long distance coach driver. Navigate through a complex highway and road network to bus stations in the more than 40 implemented cities and stay in constant communication with the headquarters.
